name: Bobbleheads: The Movie
summary_text: When the toys' humans go "AWOL," they must defend their home from unexpected guests, two uninvited intruders who hope to swap a new baseball player bobblehead for a valuable one.

name: Making the Cut
summary_text: Fashion competition series hosted by Heidi Klum & Tim Gunn featuring 10 talented entrepreneurs and designers from around the world, who are ready to take their emerging brands to the next level and become the newest global phenomenon.

name: Turistas
summary_text: A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

name: The Break
summary_text: Crime series kick-started by the finding on a young man's body.

name: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
summary_text: While attending his brother's wedding, a serial womanizer is haunted by the ghosts of his past girlfriends.

name: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
summary_text: During World War II, an American navy ship is sunk by a Japanese submarine leaving 890 crewmen stranded in shark infested waters.

name: K.C. Undercover
summary_text: An outspoken and confident technology wiz and skilled black belt discovers that both her parents are spies and expect her to follow in their footsteps.

name: Jackass: The Movie
summary_text: Johnny Knoxville and his band of maniacs perform a variety of stunts and gross-out gags on the big screen for the first time.

name: Point Blank
summary_text: An ER nurse and a career criminal are forced into an unlikely partnership in taking down a ring of corrupt cops threatening the lives of both their families.

name: Nightflyers
summary_text: A crew of scientists embarks on a mission aboard a ship called the Nightflyer to investigate a mysterious alien signal, but they soon begin to question if there is already something on the ship with them.

name: DC Super Hero Girls
summary_text: Teenage versions of DC Comics superheroines both attend high school and fight crime to protect the citizens of Metropolis.

name: The Hills
summary_text: After high school graduation, "Laguna Beach" alumna Lauren sets out to live on her own in Los Angeles and work as an intern at Teen Vogue.

name: Murder by Death
summary_text: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

name: Lodge 49
summary_text: Dud finds himself deposited by fate at the doorstep of Lodge 49, a dusty fraternal order that offers cheap beer and strange alchemical philosophies.

name: The Jungle Book
summary_text: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

name: Upside-Down Magic
summary_text: Best friends Elinor "Nory" Boxwood-Horace and Reina Carvajal discover they have magical powers: Nory can transform into animals and Reina can control fire. They enroll at Sage Academy, a prestigious magic school.

name: Daniel
summary_text: The story of Danish photographer Daniel Rye, who was captured by ISIS in Syria in 2013 and held hostage for 398 days.

name: Jungle Beat: The Movie
summary_text: A homesick alien crash-lands his spaceship near the colorful African Jungle. His new animal friends need to get him back to his ship and teach him about friendship and fun before his Space-Conqueror father can take over the planet.

name: Eraser
summary_text: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

name: Tender Cousins
summary_text: With the outbreak of WWII, the sudden call to arms will send the men of a family's estate to the front, leaving a curious adolescent alone with the remaining women of the house, in need of a warm embrace and, possibly, a daring kiss.

name: Trollhunter
summary_text: A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.

name: Howl
summary_text: When passengers on a train are attacked by a creature, they must band together in order to survive until morning.

name: Far Cry 5
summary_text: A deputy is sent to the town of Hope County to arrest Joseph Seed, a corrupt evangelical religious leader who rules the town with the help of his disturbed followers.

name: Office Christmas Party
summary_text: When his uptight CEO sister threatens to shut down his branch, the branch manager throws an epic Christmas party in order to land a big client and save the day, but the party gets way out of hand...

name: The Suite Life on Deck
summary_text: Spin-off of the hit Disney Channel series "The Suite Life of Zack & Cody," in which twin brothers Zack and Cody Martin and hotel heiress London Tipton enroll in a semester-at-sea program aboard a ship called the SS Tipton.

name: The Wedding Ringer
summary_text: Two weeks shy of his wedding, a socially awkward guy enters into a charade by hiring the owner of a company that provides best men for grooms in need.

name: Playboy: Playmates Bustin' Out
summary_text: Playboy presents its most bodacious collection yet. We've gone back to your favorite videos to bring together 41 beautiful, buxom Playmates in scene after scene of purely endowed forms. ...                See full summary »

name: Forever Young
summary_text: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

name: The Rider
summary_text: After suffering a near fatal head injury, a young cowboy undertakes a search for new identity and what it means to be a man in the heartland of America.

name: Star Trek: Insurrection
summary_text: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

name: A Most Violent Year
summary_text: In New York City 1981, an ambitious immigrant fights to protect his business and family during the most dangerous year in the city's history.

name: Passengers
summary_text: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

name: Cake
summary_text: The acerbic, hilarious Claire Bennett becomes fascinated by the suicide of a woman in her chronic pain support group. As she uncovers the details of Nina's suicide and develops a poignant relationship with Nina's husband, she also grapples with her own, very raw personal tragedy.

name: Heroes Reborn
summary_text: A year ago, a terrorist attack in Odessa, Texas, left the city decimated. Blamed for the tragic event, those with extraordinary abilities are in hiding or on the run from those with nefarious motives.

name: Dragnet 1967
summary_text: Police Detective Sgt. Joe Friday and his partners investigate crimes in Los Angeles.

name: Gargoyles
summary_text: A clan of heroic night creatures pledge to protect modern New York City as they did in Scotland one thousand years earlier.

name: Vampire Academy
summary_text: Rose Hathaway is a dhampir, a half-human, half-vampire hybrid whose life mission is to protect the moroi (mortal vampires). In particular, Rose has sworn her life to protect her best friend...                See full summary »

name: 1BR
summary_text: Sarah tries to start anew in LA, but her neighbours are not what they seem.

name: The Siege
summary_text: The secret U.S. abduction of a suspected terrorist leads to a wave of terrorist attacks in New York City, which leads to the declaration of martial-law.

name: Konosuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
summary_text: It was a happy day for Kazuma - right up to the moment he died. A goddess intervenes and offers him a second chance in a magical land.

name: The Loved Ones
summary_text: When Brent turns down his classmate Lola's invitation to the prom, she concocts a wildly violent plan for revenge.

name: The Fanatic
summary_text: A rabid film fan stalks his favorite action hero and destroys the star's life.

name: Extras
summary_text: Andy Millman (Ricky Gervais) is an actor with ambition and a script. Reduced to working as an extra with a useless agent, Andy's attempts to boost his career invariably end in failure and embarrassment.

name: The Collection
summary_text: A man who escapes from the vicious grips of the serial killer known as "The Collector" is then forced to help rescue an innocent girl from the killer's booby-trapped lair.

name: Co-Ed Confidential
summary_text: A frat house notorious for parties is turned into a co-ed residence for four freshmen under the supervision of a graduate student and her occasional boyfriend, a party animal from the closed fraternity.

name: The K2
summary_text: Kim Je Ha is former solider for hire. He is also called K2. He is hired as a bodyguard by Choi Yoo Jin. Choi Yoo Jin is the wife of Jang Se Joon, who is running for president. Meanwhile, Go...                See full summary »

name: Ride Along
summary_text: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.

name: Long Weekend
summary_text: A down-on-his-luck struggling writer, meets an enigmatic woman who enters his life at the right time.

name: Queens of Mystery
summary_text: Three crime-writing sisters and their 28-year old niece use their extensive knowledge of crime to solve whodunit style murders in the picturesque English village of Wildemarsh.

name: The Scarlet Letter
summary_text: After having a child out of wedlock, a young Puritan woman is pressured to reveal the name of her lover.

name: Daisy Jones & The Six
summary_text: Following the rise of Daisy Jones and The Six' rock band through the '70s LA music scene on their quest for worldwide icon status.

name: Altered States
summary_text: A psycho-physiologist experiments with drugs and a sensory-deprivation tank and has visions he believes are genetic memories.

name: Barb Wire
summary_text: During the Second American Civil War in 2017, Barb Wire owns a nightclub called the Hammerhead. Things become complicated when her ex-lover Axel Hood, who is married to the fugitive Corrina Devonshire, re-enters her life.

name: Chicken Little
summary_text: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

name: Changeland
summary_text: While visiting Thailand, two estranged friends realize there's no rule book for finding purpose and meaning in life.

name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
summary_text: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace, and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

name: Mayhem
summary_text: A virus spreads through an office complex causing white collar workers to act out their worst impulses.

name: Think Like a Man Too
summary_text: All the couples are back for a wedding in Las Vegas, but plans for a romantic weekend go awry when their various misadventures get them into some compromising situations that threaten to derail the big event.

name: SLC Punk!
summary_text: In the early 1980s Stevo and Heroin Bob are the only two dedicated punks in conservative Salt Lake City.

name: The Streets of San Francisco
summary_text: A veteran cop with more than twenty years of experience is teamed with a young Inspector to solve crimes in San Francisco, California.

name: Ajeeb Daastaans
summary_text: Four shorts explore the surprising ways in which unexpected catalysts inflame the uncomfortable emotions simmering under fractured relationships.

name: La Bamba
summary_text: Biographical story of the rise from nowhere of early rock and roll singer Ritchie Valens who died at age 17 in a plane crash with Buddy Holly and The Big Bopper.

name: Crashing
summary_text: A New York comic is forced to make a new start for himself after his wife leaves him.

name: The Way of the Wind
summary_text: A retelling of several episodes in the life of the Christ.

name: Kindred
summary_text: Plagued by mysterious hallucinations, a pregnant woman suspects that the family of her deceased boyfriend has intentions for her unborn child.

name: Mirror
summary_text: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

name: Kill Me Three Times
summary_text: Professional hit-man Charlie Wolfe finds himself in three tales of murder, blackmail and revenge after a botched contract assignment.

name: Johnny English Strikes Again
summary_text: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.

name: Petticoat Junction
summary_text: The misadventures of the family staff of The Shady Rest Hotel and their neighbors of Hooterville.

name: Fan Girl
summary_text: Fan Girl is about a fanatical Paulo Avelino fan (newcomer Charlie Dizon) who meets her onscreen idol (played by himself) in less than ideal circumstances after stowing away in the back of ...                See full summary »

name: Hardbodies
summary_text: Frumpy singles Hunter, Rounder and Ashby rent a beach house to take advantage of the surf, sun and scores of available women. Not having what it takes, the men hire a sexy young surfer, Scotty, to help them meet girls.

name: Better Days
summary_text: A bullied teenage girl forms an unlikely friendship with a mysterious young man who protects her from her assailants, all while she copes with the pressures of her final examinations.

name: Puss in Boots
summary_text: An outlaw cat, his childhood egg-friend and a seductive thief kitty set out in search for the eggs of the fabled Golden Goose to clear his name, restore his lost honor and regain the trust of his mother and town.

name: Curiosa
summary_text: A passionate love story set against a backdrop of sexual freedom, loosely based on the relationship between 19th-century authors Pierre Louÿs and Marie de Régnier.

name: Transporter 3
summary_text: Frank Martin is forced to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukrainian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery.

name: Even Stevens
summary_text: The Stevens family live in Sacramento, California, where the two younger children in the family, Ren and Louis, who have opposing personalities, often clash.

name: Bye Bye Birdie
summary_text: A rock singer travels to a small Ohio town to make his "farewell" television performance and kiss his biggest fan before he is drafted.

name: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
summary_text: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

name: The Frozen Ground
summary_text: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

name: The Perfect Man
summary_text: A lonely mother begins receiving romantic e-mails from a secret admirer, unaware that this perfect man is really a creation of her daughter who is trying to cheer her up.

name: The Calling
summary_text: Detective Hazel Micallef hasn't had much to worry about in the sleepy town of Fort Dundas until a string of gruesome murders in the surrounding countryside brings her face to face with a serial killer driven by a higher calling.

name: The Polar Express
summary_text: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

name: No Good Nick
summary_text: A family's lives are turned upside-down when a street-smart young grifter shows up on their doorstep claiming to be a distant relative.

name: Secret Obsession
summary_text: Recuperating from trauma, Jennifer remains in danger as she returns to a life she doesn't remember.

name: Mercury Rising
summary_text: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

name: Dead Man Walking
summary_text: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

name: Wild Orchid
summary_text: A female lawyer becomes mesmerized by a self-made millionaire during an encounter in Rio setting off a series of erotic encounters.

name: The Big Wedding
summary_text: A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.

name: Three Colors: Blue
summary_text: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

name: The Jerk
summary_text: A simpleminded, sheltered country boy suddenly decides to leave his family home to experience life in the big city, where his naivete is both his best friend and his worst enemy.

name: Final Score
summary_text: After deadly terrorists abduct his niece at a soccer match, an ex-soldier with lethal fighting skills wages a one-man war to save her and prevent mass destruction.

name: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
summary_text: A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan.

name: Slaxx
summary_text: When a possessed pair of jeans begins to kill the staff of a trendy clothing store, it is up to Libby, an idealistic young salesclerk, to stop its bloody rampage.

name: Rapunzel's Tangled Adventure
summary_text: Set between Walt Disney Animation Studios' "Tangled" and its short film "Tangled Ever After," this animated adventure/comedy series unfolds as Rapunzel acquaints herself with her parents, her kingdom and the people of Corona.

name: The Kids Are All Right
summary_text: Two children conceived by artificial insemination bring their biological father into their non-traditional family life.

name: Rings
summary_text: A young woman finds herself on the receiving end of a terrifying curse that threatens to take her life in 7 days.

name: The Secret of NIMH
summary_text: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

name: Mackenna's Gold
summary_text: A bandit kidnaps a Marshal who has seen a map showing a gold vein on Indian lands, but other groups are looking for it too, while the Apache try to keep the secret location undisturbed.

name: Europa Report
summary_text: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.

name: The Secret of My Success
summary_text: A talented young man can't get an executive position without rising through the ranks, so he comes up with a shortcut, which also benefits his love life.

name: The Wall
summary_text: Two American Soldiers are trapped by a lethal sniper, with only an unsteady wall between them.

name: Banshee Origins
summary_text: Fresh out of prison after 15 years, a master thief assumes the identity of a dead sheriff in Banshee, PA. After tracking down the woman he loves they try to avoid detection from her father; a Ukrainian mobster looking to kill them for double crossing him.

name: Magnum Force
summary_text: San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

name: The High Chaparral
summary_text: The Cannon family runs the High Chaparral Ranch in the Arizona Territory in 1870s.

name: Wings of Desire
summary_text: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

name: Man on the Moon
summary_text: The life and career of legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.

name: Jaws: The Revenge
summary_text: Chief Brody's widow believes that her family is deliberately being targeted by another shark in search of revenge.

name: Valentine's Day
summary_text: Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.

name: 90 Day Fiancé
summary_text: Using a unique 90-day engagement visa, four women travel to the US to live with their American fiancés for the first time. Each couple has 90 days to wed before the visas expire and the women must return home.

name: Debunking Borat
summary_text: The two conspiracy theorists who hosted Sacha Baron Cohen's Borat, have their theories debunked by some of the world's leading experts.

name: Twentieth Century
summary_text: A flamboyant Broadway impresario who has fallen on hard times tries to get his former lover, now a Hollywood diva, to return and resurrect his failing career.

name: Live Die Repeat and Repeat
summary_text: Plot unknown. A follow-up to the 2014 sci-fi film, 'Edge of Tomorrow'.

name: Here Are the Young Men
summary_text: Dublin teenagers Matthew, nihilistic Rez, and the deranged Kearney, leave school to a social vacuum of drinking and drugs, falling into shocking acts of transgression.

name: Anomalisa
summary_text: A man crippled by the mundanity of his life experiences something out of the ordinary.

name: Breaking the Waves
summary_text: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

name: Chained
summary_text: A young man held prisoner by a cab-driving serial killer must make a life or death choice between following in his captor's footsteps or breaking free.

name: The World's Most Amazing Vacation Rentals
summary_text: With an eye for every budget, three travelers visit vacation rentals around the globe and share their expert tips and tricks in this reality series.

name: Above the Law
summary_text: A former Special Operations Vietnam vet works as a Chicago cop, and uncovers C.I.A. wrongdoing.

name: Rampart
summary_text: Set in 1999 Los Angeles, veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, works to take care of his family, and struggles for his own survival.

name: Quarry
summary_text: Quarry, a disillusioned Vietnam War vet, returns home to Memphis in 1972 only to find rejection and scrutiny at every step. A mysterious man known only as The Broker gives him an offer he can't refuse - to work for him as a hitman.

name: Halifax f.p.
summary_text: Doctor Jane Halifax, a forensic psychiatrist investigating cases involving the mental state of suspects or victims. As Jane delves deep into the dark side of the human mind, she has her own...                See full summary »

name: Creature from the Black Lagoon
summary_text: A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.

name: Are You the One?
summary_text: Contestants stay for 10 weeks in a holiday destination to win $1 million and hopefully find love.

name: Shanghai Noon
summary_text: A Chinese man travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped Princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

name: Summer Camp Island
summary_text: Two best friends go to a magic sleep-away camp, where nothing is what it seems.

name: Paid in Full
summary_text: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience.

name: Anna Nicole
summary_text: The life of Anna Nicole Smith, from small town dancer to Playboy centerfold, to her marriage to a billionaire, and her eventual self destruction.

name: Suffragette
summary_text: In 1912 London, a young working mother is galvanized into radical political activism supporting the right for women to vote, and is willing to meet violence with violence to achieve this end.

name: My Bloody Valentine
summary_text: Tom returns to his hometown on the tenth anniversary of the Valentine's night massacre that claimed the lives of 22 people. Instead of a homecoming, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old flame is the only one that believes he's innocent.

name: Virtuosity
summary_text: When a virtual reality simulation created using the personalities of multiple serial killers manages to escape into the real world, an ex-cop is tasked with stopping its reign of terror.

name: Dad Stop Embarrassing Me!
summary_text: A single dad and cosmetics brand owner figures out fatherhood on the fly when his strong-minded teen daughter moves in with him.

name: Brahms: The Boy II
summary_text: After a family moves into the Heelshire Mansion, their young son soon makes friends with a life-like doll called Brahms.

name: Faking It
summary_text: After numerous attempts of trying to be popular two best friends decide to come out as lesbians, which launches them to instant celebrity status. Seduced by their newfound fame, Karma and Amy decide to keep up their romantic ruse.

name: The Terror Within
summary_text: When a chemical warfare leaves the world barren and filled with mutated monsters, a band of survivors in a underground complex battles one of the creatures who was able to break in.

name: Queer Eye
summary_text: A new Fab Five set out to Atlanta to help some of the city's people refine their wardrobes, grooming, diet, cultural pursuits, and home décor.

name: Mona Lisa Smile
summary_text: A free-thinking art professor teaches conservative 1950s Wellesley girls to question their traditional social roles.

name: Smurfs: The Lost Village
summary_text: In this fully animated, all-new take on the Smurfs, a mysterious map sets Smurfette and her friends Brainy, Clumsy, and Hefty on an exciting race through the Forbidden Forest, leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history.

name: The Code
summary_text: Two Canberra based brothers become entangled in a cover up that involves a remote outback community and key members of the Australian Government.

name: A Passage to India
summary_text: Cultural mistrust and false accusations doom a friendship in British colonial India between an Indian doctor, an Englishwoman engaged to marry a city magistrate, and an English educator.

name: Friday the 13th: A New Beginning
summary_text: Still haunted by his past, Tommy Jarvis - who, as a child, killed Jason Voorhees - wonders if the serial killer is connected to a series of brutal murders occurring in and around the secluded halfway house where he now lives.

name: The Asphalt Jungle
summary_text: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

name: Mary Shelley
summary_text: Life and facts of Mary Wollstonecraft Godwin, who at 16 met 21 year old poet Percy Shelley, resulting in the writing of Frankenstein.

name: Feud: Bette and Joan
summary_text: Planned anthology series centering on famous feuds, including Bette Davis and Joan Crawford that is discontinued at the moment.

name: Marvel's Avengers
summary_text: A catastrophic accident results in massive devastation. Blamed for the tragedy, the Avengers disband. Five years later, with all super heroes outlawed and the world in peril, the only hope is to reassemble Earth's Mightiest Heroes.

name: Our Planet
summary_text: Documentary series focusing on the breadth of the diversity of habitats around the world, from the remote Arctic wilderness and mysterious deep oceans to the vast landscapes of Africa and diverse jungles of South America.

name: Flora & Ulysses
summary_text: When Flora rescues a squirrel she names Ulysses, she is amazed to discover he possesses unique superhero powers, which take them on an adventure of humorous complications that ultimately change Flora's life and her outlook forever.

name: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
summary_text: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.

name: Black Water: Abyss
summary_text: Five friends exploring a remote cave system in Northern Australia find themselves threatened by a hungry crocodile.

name: Call Girl of Cthulhu
summary_text: When a virginal artist falls in love with a call girl, she turns out to be the chosen bride of the alien god Cthulhu. To save her, he must stop an ancient cult from summoning their god and destroying mankind.

name: Poltergeist
summary_text: A family whose suburban home is haunted by evil forces must come together to rescue their youngest daughter after the apparitions take her captive.

name: Here Comes the Boom
summary_text: A high-school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extracurricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

name: A Star Is Born
summary_text: A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

name: The War Wagon
summary_text: The story of a man who was shot, robbed and imprisoned who returns to steal a large gold shipment from the man who wronged him. The gold is transported in an armored stage coach, the War Wagon.

name: Celebrity Family Feud
summary_text: Teams of celebrities and their families face off to name the top responses to questions posed to 100 people.

name: Frozen
summary_text: Three skiers stranded on a chairlift are forced to make life-or-death choices, which prove more perilous than staying put and freezing to death.

name: Sir Alex Ferguson: Never Give In
summary_text: A look at the life and legend of Manchester United manager Alex Ferguson.

name: Dracula
summary_text: Dracula travels to London, with dark plans for revenge against those who ruined his life centuries earlier. However, his plan is complicated when he falls in love with a woman who seems to be a reincarnation of his dead wife.

name: Kill la Kill
summary_text: A young girl arrives at a school of superhumans to find out the truth behind her father's murder.

name: Baptiste
summary_text: The mercurial detective, Julien Baptiste, on holiday in Amsterdam with his wife, assists in an investigation for his former girlfriend, the Amsterdam Chief of Police.

name: Mirrors
summary_text: An ex-cop and his family are the target of an evil force that is using mirrors as a gateway into their home.

name: Mommie Dearest
summary_text: The abusive and traumatic adoptive upbringing of Christina Crawford at the hands of her mother, screen queen Joan Crawford, is depicted.

name: Ironheart
summary_text: The genius teenage-girl inventor Riri Williams creates the most advanced suit of armor since Iron Man.

name: I Am the Night
summary_text: In early 1960s, a teenage girl looking for her real father and a disgraced journalist seeking closure find themselves drawn into a web of secrets revolving around L.A.'s most infamous cold case, the Black Dahlia (Elizabeth Short) murder.

name: Beverly Hills Ninja
summary_text: A man tries to rescue a woman with a little help from his half brother.

name: Philomena
summary_text: A world-weary political journalist picks up the story of a woman's search for her son, who was taken away from her decades ago after she became pregnant and was forced to live in a convent.

name: Broken
summary_text: Father Michael, a Catholic priest presiding over a Northern urban parish who is Modern, maverick, and reassuringly flawed; must be confidant, counsellor and confessor to a congregation ...                See full summary »

name: Kill the Irishman
summary_text: The true story of Danny Greene, a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970's.

name: Hope Lost
summary_text: A young girl meets a producer who wants to cast her in a show in Italy. But when she arrives, she is sold into prostitution and then bought by a sadist who makes snuff movies.

name: Once
summary_text: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

name: The Eagle
summary_text: In Roman-ruled Britain, a young Roman soldier endeavors to honor his father's memory by finding his lost legion's golden emblem.

name: Sweetbitter
summary_text: A young woman learns how crazy it is to work in a restaurant.

name: Rurouni Kenshin
summary_text: The adventures of a young wandering swordsman who stumbles upon a struggling martial arts school in Meiji era Japan.

name: Perfume
summary_text: When a singer is found murdered, with her scent glands excised from her body, detectives probe a group of friends who attended boarding school with her.

name: Camp Rock
summary_text: At a music camp for gifted teens, a popular teen idol overhears a girl singing and sets out to find who the talented voice belongs to. What he doesn't know is that the girl is actually a camp kitchen worker with a fear of being heard.

name: Lucky Man
summary_text: From the mind of comic book legend Stan Lee comes a bold new action crime series about a brilliant but flawed police officer with the power to control luck.

name: The Lost Husband
summary_text: Trying to put her life back together after her husband's death, Libby and her children move to her estranged aunt's goat farm in central Texas.

name: Battlestar Galactica
summary_text: Following the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Kobol by the Cylons, a rag-tag fugitive fleet of the last remnants of mankind flees the pursuing Cylons while simultaneously searching for their true home: Earth.

name: Night of the Comet
summary_text: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

name: The Cave
summary_text: Blood-thirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.

name: Monarca
summary_text: After 20 years, Ana María returns to Mexico and vies for control of her family's tequila empire as it threatens to crumble under corruption and secrets.

name: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
summary_text: Two con men try to settle their rivalry by betting on who can swindle a young American heiress out of fifty thousand dollars first.

name: Malice
summary_text: A tale about a happily married couple who would like to have children. Tracy teaches art, Andy's a college dean. Things are never the same after she is taken to hospital and operated upon by Jed, a "know all" doctor.

name: The Staircase
summary_text: The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001.

name: The Pledge
summary_text: A retiring police detective pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

name: Hunger
summary_text: Irish republican Bobby Sands leads the inmates of a Northern Irish prison in a hunger strike.

name: Salmon Fishing in the Yemen
summary_text: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

name: Runners
summary_text: When his young daughter disappears, her father refuses to accept that she is dead and sets out on a journey to find her.

name: The Final Countdown
summary_text: A modern aircraft carrier is thrown back in time to 1941 near Hawaii, just hours before the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

name: Ringu
summary_text: A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.

name: Red Riding Hood
summary_text: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

name: They Live by Night
summary_text: An escaped convict, injured during a robbery, falls in love with the woman who nurses him back to health, but their relationship seems doomed from the beginning.

name: Dirty Sexy Saint
summary_text: Of all the bars in all of Chicago, she walks into his. Based on the novel by New York Times best-selling authors Carly Phillips and Erika Wilde.

name: BASEketball
summary_text: Two childhood friends are pro athletes of a national sport called BASEketball, a hybrid of baseball and basketball, and must deal with a greedy businessman scheming against their team.

name: My Tutor
summary_text: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.

name: The Sea of Trees
summary_text: A suicidal American befriends a Japanese man lost in a forest near Mt. Fuji and the two search for a way out.

name: Misfits of Science
summary_text: The adventures of a team of misfit superheroes who fight crime for a scientific think tank.

name: Cracker
summary_text: Dr Edward "Fitz" Fitzgerald is a criminal psychologist. He is rather anti-social and obnoxious but he has a gift for solving crimes. Thus he is employed as a consultant by the Manchester Police.

name: Erufen rîto
summary_text: Two university students come across a seemingly harmless girl named Lucy, unaware that she's actually a mutant serial killer with a split personality.

name: Batman Beyond
summary_text: Fuelled by remorse and vengeance, a high schooler named Terry McGinnis revives the role of Batman. Under supervision of an elderly Bruce Wayne, he fights crime in a harsh, futuristic Gotham.

name: Porco Rosso
summary_text: In 1930s Italy, a veteran World War I pilot is cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

name: Every Day
summary_text: A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning.

name: The Gilded Age
summary_text: A wide-eyed young scion of a conservative family embarks on a mission to infiltrate the wealthy neighboring clan dominated by ruthless railroad tycoon George Russell, his rakish son, Larry, and his ambitious wife, Bertha.

name: Stuck in the Middle
summary_text: Teenager Harley Diaz maneuvers her way through the bustle of being a middle child in a family with six other siblings.

name: Dark Blue
summary_text: A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.

name: Inkheart
summary_text: A teenage girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.

name: The Lego Ninjago Movie
summary_text: Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas.

name: Hazel
summary_text: The misadventures of the Baxter family and their live-in maid, Hazel Burke.

name: Death Sentence
summary_text: Nick Hume is a mild-mannered executive with a perfect life, until one gruesome night he witnesses something that changes him forever. Transformed by grief, Hume eventually comes to the disturbing conclusion that no length is too great when protecting his family.

name: Turbo Charged Prelude to 2 Fast 2 Furious
summary_text: Taking place after The Fast and The Furious, Brian O'Connor tries to evade the law, which leads up to the events of 2 Fast 2 Furious.

name: A Good Old Fashioned Orgy
summary_text: A group of 30-year-olds who have been friends since high school attempt to throw an end-of-summer orgy.

name: Repo! The Genetic Opera
summary_text: A worldwide epidemic encourages a biotech company to launch an organ-financing program similar in nature to a standard car loan. The repossession clause is a killer, however.

name: Beasts of No Nation
summary_text: A drama based on the experiences of Agu, a child soldier fighting in the civil war of an unnamed African country.

name: Fanny and Alexander
summary_text: Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.

name: Temple
summary_text: UK version of the Norwegian show about a surgeon who is determined to save his dying wife to the point of agreeing to treat criminals and others for cash in his highly illegal secret underground clinic.

name: Young Wallander
summary_text: Follow recently graduated police officer Kurt Wallander as he investigates his first case.

name: Tulip Fever
summary_text: An artist falls for a young married woman while he's commissioned to paint her portrait during the Tulip mania of seventeenth century Amsterdam.

name: The Bounty Hunter
summary_text: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.

name: The Langoliers
summary_text: Most of the passengers on an airplane disappear, and the remainder land the plane in a mysteriously barren airport.

name: Monsterland
summary_text: Encounters with Gothic beasts, including fallen angels and werewolves, broken people are driven to desperate acts in an attempt to repair their lives, ultimately showing there is a thin line between man and beast.

name: A Teacher
summary_text: A high school teacher in Austin, Texas takes sexual advantage over one of her students. Her life begins to unravel as the details of the relationship are exposed.

name: Timecop
summary_text: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

name: Mersal
summary_text: A magician and a doctor attempt to expose the corruption at the heart of India's medical industry.

name: Driven
summary_text: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

name: One Crazy Summer
summary_text: An aspiring teenage cartoonist and his friends come to the aid of a singer trying to save her family property from developers.

name: American Ultra
summary_text: A stoner - who is in fact a government agent - is marked as a liability and targeted for extermination. But he's too well-trained and too high for them to handle.

name: Super Dragon Ball Heroes
summary_text: The Z-Fighters set out to rescue Trunks from a prison planet.

name: The Mexican
summary_text: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

name: Tangerine
summary_text: A hooker tears through Tinseltown on Christmas Eve searching for the pimp who broke her heart.

name: Flesh and Bone
summary_text: A talented but emotionally troubled dancer runs away to New York City and quickly finds herself immersed in the cutthroat world of professional ballet.

name: The Batman
summary_text: Billionaire Bruce Wayne fights crime and evil as the mysterious Batman.

name: Gwendoline
summary_text: Gwendoline, a runaway nun, arrives in Hong Kong on a mission to find her father, who was last seen in the legendary Land of the Yik Yak searching for a rare butterfly. She's guided on her perilous journey by the selfish mercenary Willard.

name: Acts of Violence
summary_text: At a bachelorette party in a nightclub, the bride tells 2 guys offering blow to go away. They abduct her. The groom's 2 big brothers looked after their kid brother as kids and do so now again as veterans, "looking" for her and the 2 guys.

name: Fist Fight
summary_text: When one school teacher unwittingly causes another teacher's dismissal, he is challenged to an after-school fight.

name: Someone Has to Die
summary_text: The story begins with a young boy being asked by his parents to return to Spain to meet his fiance. He returns accompanied by Lazaro, a mysterious ballet dancer.

name: Wicker Park
summary_text: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a café is his long-lost love. His belief leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold in order to trail her.

name: Trumbo
summary_text: In 1947, Dalton Trumbo was Hollywood's top screenwriter, until he and other artists were jailed and blacklisted for their political beliefs.

name: Noragami
summary_text: A minor god seeking to gain widespread worship teams up with a human girl he saved to gain fame, recognition and at least one shrine dedicated to him.

name: Jersey Shore
summary_text: A reality-based look at the vapid lives of several New Jersey 20-somethings and their respective friends and/or hook-ups.

name: Eskiya Dünyaya Hükümdar Olmaz
summary_text: The series tells the life of Hizir Cakirbeyli. It has entered the realm of the mafia at a young age.

name: Sound of Freedom
summary_text: The story of Tim Ballard (Jim Caviezel), a former US government agent, who quits his job in order to devote his life to rescuing children from global sex traffickers.

name: Hot Shots! Part Deux
summary_text: "Rambo" parody in which Topper Harley leads a rescue team into Iraq to save Iraqi war prisoners and all of their previous rescue teams.

name: Regression
summary_text: A detective and a psychoanalyst uncover evidence of a satanic cult while investigating a young woman's terrifying past.

name: Guiding Light
summary_text: This show took place in the fictional Midwestern town of Springfield and centered on the middle class Bauer family.

name: Rumble Fish
summary_text: Absent-minded street thug Rusty James struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days of gang warfare.

name: Django
summary_text: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a half-breed prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.

name: The Andromeda Strain
summary_text: A team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.

name: I, Claudius
summary_text: The history of the Roman Empire as experienced by one of its rulers.

name: Bug
summary_text: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

name: Avengers Assemble
summary_text: The further adventures of the Marvel Universe's mightiest general membership superhero team.

name: El Mariachi
summary_text: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.
